Question
========

The function `map_dbl()` takes a [[1]] and returns a [[2]].

Which ordered pair of words replaces [[1]] and [[2]] to best complete the sentence?

Answerlist
----------

* vector, `double`
* vector, `character`
* `matrix`, `double`
* `data.frame`, `list`
* vector, `data.frame`

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Correct
* No, it always returns a `double`
* No, it takes a vector
* No, it takes a vector
* No, it always returns a `double`
